title: Cosmonautテーマ
content:
[[iftags +テーマ]]


[[include :scp-jp:credit:start-preview]]
**タイトル:** Cosmonautテーマ
**翻訳責任者:** [[*user nebula2700]]
**翻訳年:** 2025
**原題:** Cosmonaut Theme
**著作権者:** [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]
**作成年:** 2022
**初訳時参照リビジョン:** 23
**元記事リンク:** [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/theme:cosmonaut ソース]
[[include :scp-jp:credit:end-preview]]

このオネイロイ・コレクティブGoIテーマは [[*user Luxaiko]]のために[[*user EstrellaYoshte]]によって作成されました。このテーマは[[[theme:newspaper|Newspaperテーマ]]]からフォークされました。

テーマを使用するには、以下のコードを挿入してください:

> {{@@[[include :scp-jp:theme:cosmonaut]]@@}}

トワイライトバージョンを使用するには、代わりに以下のコードを挿入してください:

> {{@@[[include :scp-jp:theme:cosmonaut twilight=--]]@@}}


------

[[include :scp-jp:component:image-block name= https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A8260379-74-cf41/hpl2.png|caption=画像。|width=240px]]

上のような装飾付きの罫線は5つのハイフン「- - - - -」を使用して作成できます。

見出しは、行の先頭に1～6文字の「+」を置くことで作成できます

[[=]]
++++* ヘッダーフォントはBerkshire Swash[[footnote]] 日本語文字はKaisei Opti [[/footnote]]。
BodyフォントはAtkinson Hyperlegible。
@@@@
{{等幅フォントはAnonymous Pro。}}
[[/=]]

装飾は以下のものを使用しています:
[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Book_decoration_BPPxii.svg?uselang=ja ウィキメディア・コモンズ1]
[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Fine_Ornament_Black_L.svg?uselang=ja ウィキメディア・コモンズ2]
[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Ornamental_corner_by_S._H._Redmond_02.svg?uselang=ja ウィキメディア・コモンズ3]

ヘッダーロゴはAethrisによるもので、背景の雲は[[*user Luxaiko]]によるものです。

#content-wrap {
    margin: 0.5rem 1.5rem 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    max-width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-around;
    grid-gap: 1.5rem;
}

#content-wrap::after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    height: 100%;
    width: max(0rem, calc(100vw - var(--sidebar-width) - var(--body-width)));
    max-width: var(--sidebar-width);
}


body {
    font-family: var(--body-font);
    line-height: 1.5;
    color: var(--textColor);
    background-color: var(--firstOneiroiColor);
    background-image: none;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
li, p { line-height: inherit; }

#page-info, .code, tt, .page-watch-options, .page-source {
    font-family: var(--mono-font);
    font-size: 1em;
}
.code pre, .code p { font-family: inherit; }
.code pre * { white-space: pre; }

.code *,
.pre * {
    font-feature-settings: unset;
}

/*--------------------------------*/

a:not(.rate-box-with-credit-button a, .page-rate-widget-box a, yui-nav a) {
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

::selection {
    background: var(--selectionColor);
    color: var(--textColor);
}

/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- HEADER -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

div#container-wrap {
    background-image: none;
}

div#header {
    background-image: none;
    height: 240px;
}

div#extrac-div-1 {
    display: block;
    height: calc(18rem + 3vh);
    width: 100vw;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    position: fixed;
    background-color: var(--secondOneiroiColor);
    z-index: -1;
    clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 99%, 0 99%);
}

div#extrac-div-1::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: var(--firstOneiroiColor);
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--backgroundMask);
    mask-image: var(--backgroundMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: 100vw auto;
    mask-size: 100vw auto;
    -webkit-mask-position: 50% 100%;
    mask-position: 50% 100%;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
}

#header h1 {
    margin-left: 0;
    float: none;
    text-align: center;
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    filter: none;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: filter 0.2s ease-out;
}

#header h1:is(:hover,:focus-within) {
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 0px 1.75em var(--foamGreenColor)) brightness(1.75);
}

#header h1 a {
    max-height: initial;
    display: block;
    height: 200px;
    width: 200px;
    background-color: var(--headerColor);
    margin: auto;
    margin-top: 1.25rem;
    padding: 0;
    pointer-events: all;
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--headerMask);
    mask-image: var(--headerMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: contain;
    mask-size: contain;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
}

#header h1 span {
    font-size: 0;
    display: none;
}

#header h2 {
    display: none;
}

#login-status {
    color: var(--textColor);
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
    padding: 0.3rem 0.25rem 0.4rem 0.5rem;
    border-radius: 0 0 0.5rem 0.5rem;

    top: 0;
}

a#my-account {
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

a#account-topbutton {
    color: var(--secondOneiroiColor);

}

div#account-options {
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);

    display: block !important;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: opacity 0.15s;
}

#account-options li a {
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

#account-options li a:hover,
#account-options li a:focus {
    color: var(--textColor);
    background-color: var(--selectionColor);
    text-decoration: none;
}

#account-topbutton:focus+#account-options,
#account-topbutton:active+#account-options,
#account-options:focus-within {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
}

@media (pointer: coarse) {

    #account-topbutton:hover+#account-options,
    #account-options:hover {
        opacity: 1;
        pointer-events: all;
    }
}

div#search-top-box {
    top: 2.25rem;
    right: 0.625rem;
    width: 1.6rem;
}

div#search-top-box::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0.05rem;
    background-color: var(--accentColor);
    pointer-events: none;
    z-index: 2;
    -webkit-mask-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3C?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='no'?%3E%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 512 512'%3E%3Cmetadata/%3E%3Cpath d='M505 443 405 343c-4-4-10-7-17-7h-16a208 208 0 1 0-36 36v16c0 7 3 13 7 17l100 100c9 9 24 9 34 0l28-28c9-10 9-25 0-34zM208 336a128 128 0 1 1 0-256 128 128 0 0 1 0 256z'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
    mask-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3C?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='no'?%3E%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 512 512'%3E%3Cmetadata/%3E%3Cpath d='M505 443 405 343c-4-4-10-7-17-7h-16a208 208 0 1 0-36 36v16c0 7 3 13 7 17l100 100c9 9 24 9 34 0l28-28c9-10 9-25 0-34zM208 336a128 128 0 1 1 0-256 128 128 0 0 1 0 256z'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
    -webkit-mask-size: 1rem;
    mask-size: 1rem;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    opacity: 1;
    transition: opacity 0.25s ease;
}

div#search-top-box form {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-end;
}

div#search-top-box form input[type="text"]:not(:focus),
div#search-top-box form input[type="text"]:not(:focus):not(:hover) {
    position: relative;
    color: transparent;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: none;
    font-family: var(--body-font);
    width: 1.6rem;
    height: 1.6rem;
    padding: 0.1em 0.5em;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
    border: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 2px 1.5px var(--shadow);
}

div#search-top-box form input[type="text"],
div#search-top-box form input[type="text"]:hover,
div#search-top-box form input[type="text"]:focus {
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor) !important;
    color: var(--textColor);
    display: inline-block;
    border: none;
    height: 1.6rem;
    width: 12rem;
    transition: width 0.25s;
    outline: none;
}

div#search-top-box form input[type="submit"].button {
    display: block;
    height: 1.6rem;
    width: 1.6rem;
    border: none;
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
    color: transparent;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.25rem var(--shadow);
    text-shadow: none;
    background: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
}

div#search-top-box form input[type="submit"].button:is(:hover, :focus) {
    background: var(--selectionColor);
}

#top-bar {
    top: 14.6rem;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    right: 0;
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
    .mobile-top-bar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        max-width: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        left: 0;
    }
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li>a {
    color: var(--accentColor);
    font-weight: bold;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul li a {
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li>a:hover,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li.sfhover>a,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li:focus-within>a {
    background-color: transparent;
    background: none;
    color: var(--secondOneiroiColor);
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li.sfhover {
    background-color: transparent;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--selectionColor) 0%, var(--selectionColor) 100%);
    background-size: 0 100%;
    background-position: 0 100%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    transition: background-size var(--link-timing);
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li:hover,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li:focus-within {
    background-color: transparent;
    background-size: 100% 100%;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul {
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
    border: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul li:first-of-type a {
    border-top-left-radius: 0.5rem;
    border-top-right-radius: 0.5rem;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul li:last-of-type a {
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0.5rem;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 0.5rem;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul li,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul li a {
    background: transparent;
    border: none;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul li a:hover,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul li ul li a:focus {
    color: var(--textColor);
    background-color: var(--selectionColor);
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"] ul>li>ul>li>a {
    height: auto;
    max-height: none;
    line-height: 1.5 !important;
    padding-top: 0.1rem;
    padding-bottom: 0.1rem;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li>ul {
    visibility: visible;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
}

#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li:hover>ul,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li>ul:hover,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li:focus-within>ul,
#top-bar div[class*="top-bar"]>ul>li>ul:focus-within {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
}

/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- SIDEBAR -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

div#side-bar {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0;
    position: sticky;
    top: 1.5rem;
    left: 0;
    height: calc(100vh - 3rem);
    clear: both;
    padding: 0.8em;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 1.25rem;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.35rem var(--shadow);
    overflow-x: hidden;
    min-width: var(--sidebar-width);
    scrollbar-width: none;
    background-color: var(--secondOneiroiColor);
    border-left: solid 0.2rem var(--selectionColor);
}

div#side-bar:target {
    border: none;
    border-left: solid 0.2rem var(--selectionColor);
}

div#side-bar::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 0;
}

#side-bar .side-block, .side-block[style="background-color: #a7dba2;"], .side-block.sns, #interwiki .side-block  {
    border: transparent;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
    background-color: inherit !important;
}

#interwiki .side-block

#side-bar .side-block.media {
    background-color: inherit;
}

#side-bar .side-block.media>* {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-evenly;
}

#side-bar .side-block.resources {
    background-color: inherit;
}

#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link {
    border-bottom: solid 1px var(--selectionColor);
}

#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link .collapsible-block-link,
#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link .collapsible-block-link:hover {
    color: var(--selectionColor);
}

:is(#side-bar, #interwiki) .heading {
    color: var(--selectionColor);
    font-family: var(--header-font);
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    border-bottom: none;
    margin-top: 0.625rem;
    padding-left: 0;
    padding-right: 0.25rem;
}

:is(#side-bar, #interwiki) .heading>p {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}

:is(#side-bar, #interwiki) .heading>p::before {
    content: "";
    display: inline-block;
    width: 2rem;
    height: 2rem;
    margin: 0 0.25rem 0 -0.375rem;
    background-color: currentColor;
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: contain;
    mask-size: contain;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
}

:is(#side-bar, #interwiki) .heading>p::after {
    content: "";
    display: inline-block;
    height: 0.1rem;
    background-color: currentColor;
    flex-basis: 1rem;
    flex-grow: 1;
    margin-left: 0.375rem;
}

.side-block .menu-item>.image {
    display: none;
}

#side-bar div.menu-item a {
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

#top-bar div.open-menu a {
    border-radius: 0.35rem;
    box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    color: var(--accentColor) !important;
    background-color: var(--secondOneiroiColor) !important;
    border: none !important;
    padding: 0.15rem;
    user-select: none;
}

/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- MAIN -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

#main-content {
    background-color: rgba(var(--maincontentColor), 0.83);
    padding: 0.5em 2em 0.75em;
    box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    width: 100%;
    max-width: var(--body-width);
    margin: 0;
    border-radius: 1.25rem;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    min-width: min(100vw, calc(var(--body-width) / 3));
    z-index: 0;
}

#main-content::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    display: block;
    height: auto;
    width: 22.5%;
    aspect-ratio: 1;
    background-color: var(--foamGreenColor);
    z-index: -1;
    opacity: 0.25;
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--cornerdecoMask);
    mask-image: var(--cornerdecoMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: contain;
    mask-size: contain;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
    bottom: 1.25rem;
    right: 1.05rem;
}

#page-title,
.meta-title {
    color: var(--headerColor);
    font-family: var(--header-font);
    font-size: 3em;
    font-weight: bold;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center;
    border-bottom: none;
    margin: 0.25rem 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
}

#page-title::before,
.meta-title::before,
#page-title::after,
.meta-title::after {
    content: "";
    min-width: 4.25rem;
    height: 4.5rem;
    display: block;
    margin: 0 0.325rem;
    background-color: currentColor;
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: contain;
    mask-size: contain;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
}

#page-title::after,
.meta-title::after {
    transform: scale(-1);
}

.yui-navset .yui-nav a,

}

.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a,

.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected,

.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a,

#page-content .rate-box-with-credit-button {

#page-content .page-rate-widget-box, .rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton {

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
    font-family: var(--header-font);
    color: var(--headerColor);
    font-weight: bold;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
}

:is(h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6):not(#header h1, #header h2)::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 98.75%;
    left: -0.65rem;
    background-color: transparent;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1rem;
    border-top: 0.15em solid currentColor;
    border-top-left-radius: 1rem;
    -webkit-mask-image: linear-gradient(90deg, black, transparent);
    mask-image: linear-gradient(90deg, black, transparent);
    pointer-events: none;
}

:is(h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6):not(#header h1, #header h2)::after {
    content: "";
    display: inline-block;
    width: 1.65em;
    height: 1.75em;
    transform: scale(-1);
    margin-left: 0.25em;
    background-color: currentColor;
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: contain;
    mask-size: contain;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
}

#page-content div[style*="text-align: center"]> :is(h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6) {
    justify-content: center;
}

#page-content div[style*="text-align: center"]> :is(h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6)::before {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0;
    position: initial;
    top: initial;
    left: initial;
    display: inline-block;
    width: 1.65em;
    height: 1.75em;
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0.25em;
    background-color: currentColor;
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    mask-image: var(--titledecoMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: contain;
    mask-size: contain;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
}

hr {
    margin: 2.25rem 0;
    height: 4rem;
    background: linear-gradient(0deg, var(--headerColor), var(--accentColor));
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--hrMask);
    mask-image: var(--hrMask);
    -webkit-mask-size: contain;
    mask-size: contain;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-mask-position: center;
    mask-position: center;
}

blockquote,
div.blockquote,
#toc,
.page-source {
    border: none;
    background: transparent;
    padding: 0.75rem 0.95rem;
    position: relative;
    margin: 0.75rem 1.5rem 0.75rem 0.5rem;
    padding-left: 2rem;
    filter: drop-shadow(0 0 0.15rem var(--shadow));
}

#page-content blockquote,
#page-content div.blockquote {
    margin: 0.75rem auto;
    max-width: calc(var(--body-width)*0.7);
}

blockquote::before,
div.blockquote::before,
#toc::before,
.page-source::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: -1;
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor);
    border-radius: 0 0.75rem 0.75rem 0;
    --bq-edge-mask: linear-gradient(#000 0 0) right/calc(100% - 1.25rem) 100% no-repeat, radial-gradient(circle 0.625rem at 0% 75%, #0000 98%, #000) 0.625rem 50%/0.625rem 2.5rem repeat-y, radial-gradient(circle closest-side at 50% 25%, #000 99%, #0000 101%) left/1.25rem 2.5rem repeat-y;
    -webkit-mask: var(--bq-edge-mask);
    mask: var(--bq-edge-mask);
    pointer-events: none;
}

.scp-image-block {
    border: none;
    box-shadow: none;
}

.scp-image-block.block-right {
    margin: 0.5rem 0 1rem 1rem;
}

.scp-image-block.block-left {
    margin: 0.5rem 1rem 1rem 0;
}

.scp-image-block img {
    margin-bottom: -0.325rem;
}

.scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor);
    border-top: none;
    padding: 0.65rem 0.25rem;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.25rem var(--shadow);
    transform: scale(1.05);
}

#page-content .wiki-content-table tr th {
    border: solid 1px var(--secondOneiroiColor);
    color: var(--headerColor);
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor);
}

#page-content .wiki-content-table tr td {
    border: solid 1px var(--secondOneiroiColor);
}

a.footnoteref {
    padding: 0 0.25em 1px;
    margin-left: -0.15em;
}

.hovertip {
    font-size: 1.25em;
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor) !important;
    border: none !important;
    color: var(--textColor) !important;
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.25rem var(--shadow);
    padding: 0.35rem;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: min(24rem, 60vw) !important;
    top: initial !important;
    left: initial !important;
    position: fixed !important;
    display: block !important;
    bottom: 2rem;
    right: -25rem;
    transition: right 0.45s cubic-bezier(0.6, 0.18, 0.27, 0.88);
    transition-delay: 0.455s;
    z-index: 29;
}

div[id$="button-hovertip"] {
    transition-delay: 0s;
}

.hovertip[style*="display: block"],
.hovertip:hover {
    z-index: 30;
    right: 1rem;
    transition-delay: 0s;
}

.footnote .f-heading {
    color: var(--headerColor);
    font-family: var(--header-font);
}

.footnote .f-footer,
.equation .e-footer,
.reference .r-footer {
    display: none;
}

.footnotes-footer {
    border: none;
    border-left: solid 0.2rem var(--headerColor);
    padding: 0.75rem 1rem 1rem;
    margin: 0.75rem 0;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.25rem var(--shadow);
}

.footnotes-footer .title {
    color: var(--headerColor);
    font-family: var(--header-font);
    margin: 0 0 0.625rem 0;
}

#lock-info {
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.35rem var(--shadow);
}

/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- CUSTOM ELEMENTS -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

#page-content .cloudbox {
    background-color: var(--firstOneiroiColor);
    padding: 0 1.65rem 0.5rem;
    margin: min(calc(32% + 2rem + 6vw), 17rem) auto 1rem;
    position: relative;
    max-width: 38rem;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: 0 0 1.5rem 1.5rem;
    z-index: 0;
}

.cloudbox::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgb(var(--maincontentColor)), var(--firstOneiroiColor));
    width: 100%;
    bottom: 99%;
    left: 0;
    height: 17rem;
    position: absolute;
    -webkit-mask-image: var(--cloudboxMask);
    -webkit-mask-position: bottom;
    -webkit-mask-size: 100%;
    -webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
    pointer-events: none;
}

.cloudbox::after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    background: var(--secondOneiroiColor);
    width: 59%;
    height: 0;
    padding-top: 40%;
    bottom: 101%;
    left: 5%;
    z-index: -1;
    border-radius: 2rem 0;
    pointer-events: none;
}

.or-card {
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0.5rem 0 0.5rem 1rem;
    padding: 0 0.75em;
    float: right;
    clear: right;
    font-size: 95%;
    width: 15rem;
    position: relative;
}

.or-card::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    display: block;
    top: 0;
    left: -0.15rem;
    background: linear-gradient(0deg, var(--headerColor), var(--accentColor));
    height: 100%;
    width: 0.1rem;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    opacity: 0.5;
}

@media (max-width: 36rem) {
    .or-card {
        margin: 0.5rem auto 0.5rem;
        padding: 0 0.75em;
        float: none;
        clear: both;
    }
}

.or-footer {
    display: flex;
    clear: both;
    justify-content: space-between;
    text-align: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    font-family: var(--mono-font);
    align-items: center;
}

.or-footer>p {
    display: contents;
    width: 100%;
}

.or-footer>p span:first-child {
    font-style: italic;
}

.or-footer>p span:last-child a {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: var(--winePurpleColor);
}

.or-footer span a::before {
    content: "[";
}

.or-footer span a::after {
    content: "]";
}

.or-excerpt {
    float: left;
    width: 22rem;
    padding: 1em 1.25em;
    margin: -2.5rem 1.5rem 1rem -3rem;
    background-color: var(--firstOneiroiColor);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.1rem var(--shadow);
    font-size: 92.5%;
    transform: rotate(-1deg);
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
}

@media (max-width: 50rem) {
    .or-excerpt {
        margin: 0.5rem auto 0.5rem;
        float: none;
        clear: both;
    }
}

.or-tweet {
    font-size: 1.5em;
    width: 28rem;
    padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0.5rem auto;
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor);
    box-shadow: 0.05rem 0.1rem 0.45rem 0 var(--shadow);
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
}

.or-tweet::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    width: 2.5em;
    height: 2.5em;
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-image: var(--pfp);
    float: left;
    margin: 0.5em 0.5em 0 0;
}

.or-tweet>ul li {
    font-size: 0.625em;
    color: var(--winePurpleColor);
}

.or-tweet>ul li:nth-of-type(1)::before {
    content: "共有";
}

.or-tweet>ul li:nth-of-type(2)::before {
    content: "いいね！";
}

.or-tweet>ul li::before {
    color: var(--secondOneiroiColor);
    opacity: 0.625;
    margin-right: 0.5em;
}

.or-tweet p:first-child>span:first-child {
    font-size: 0.75em;
    opacity: 0.625;
}

.or-tweet p:last-child>span:last-child {
    font-size: 0.55em;
    opacity: 0.625;
}

.or-comment {
    padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0.5rem auto;
    background-color: var(--hazyCyanColor);
    box-shadow: 0.05rem 0.1rem 0.45rem 0 var(--shadow);
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
}

.or-comment::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    width: 2.5em;
    height: 2.5em;
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-image: var(--pfp);
    float: left;
    margin: 0.5em 0.5em 0 0;
}

.or-comment p:last-child>span:last-child {
    font-size: 0.85em;
    opacity: 0.625;
}

/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- BOTTOM -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

#main-content .page-tags span {
    max-width: 100%;
    border-top: none;
}

#main-content .page-tags a {
    height: 0.825rem;
    font-family: var(--mono-font);
    font-size: 0.825rem;
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
    color: var(--textColor);
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
    margin: 0.25rem 0.2rem;
    padding: 0.21rem 0.35rem 0.22rem 0.3rem;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.1rem var(--shadow);
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--selectionColor) 0%, var(--selectionColor) 100%);
    background-size: 0 100%;
    background-position: 0 100%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    transition: background-size var(--link-timing);
}

#main-content .page-tags a:hover,
#main-content .page-tags a:focus {
    background-size: 100% 100%;
    text-decoration: none;
}

#main-content .page-tags a::before {
    content: "#";
    padding-right: 0.1em;
}

.owindow {
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
    border: none;
}

.owindow .modal-header {
    background-color: transparent;
}

.owindow .modal-body img {
    background-color: transparent !important;
}

.owindow .title {
    font-family: var(--mono-font);
    background-color: transparent;
    color: var(--headerColor);
    border-bottom: none;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0.5em 0 0;
}

.owindow .button-bar a {
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
    border-color: var(--accentColor);
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

.owindow .button-bar a:hover {
    background-color: var(--accentColor);
    color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
}

#page-content .modalbox, #u-credit-otherwise .modalbox {
    background: var(--primaryBackgroundColor) !important;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0.25rem var(--shadow);
    padding: 0.25rem 1.25rem;
}

#page-content .modalbox-title {
    background: transparent;
}

#page-content .modalbox hr {
    margin: 0.5rem 0;
    height: 1.5rem;
}

.modalbox .modalbox-ratemodule .page-rate-widget-box {
    translate: 0 1rem !important;
}

.buttons .btn {
    background-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
    border-color: var(--accentColor);
    color: var(--accentColor);
    padding: 3px 5px;
}

.buttons .btn:hover {
    background-color: var(--accentColor);
    color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
}

a.action-area-close:hover {
    background-color: var(--accentColor);
    color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
}

.pager .current {
    background-color: var(--accentColor);
    border-color: var(--primaryBackgroundColor);
}

/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- PARTICLES -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

@keyframes animParticle {
    0% {
        transform: translateY(0px);
    }

    100% {
        transform: translateY(-2560px);
    }
}

@media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference) {
    #extra-div-1,
    #extra-div-2 {
        position: fixed;
        display: block;
        pointer-events: none;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
    }

    #extra-div-1::before,
    #extra-div-1::after,
    #extra-div-2::before,
    #extra-div-2::after {
        content: "";
        display: block;
        background: transparent;
        border-radius: 50%;
        z-index: 11;
        position: absolute;
    }

    #extra-div-1::before,
    #extra-div-1::after {
        height: 1px;
        width: 1px;
        top: 0px;
        animation: animParticle 350s linear infinite;
        box-shadow: var(--particle1);
    }

    #extra-div-2::before,
    #extra-div-2::after {
        height: 2px;
        width: 2px;
        top: 0px;
        animation: animParticle 200s linear infinite;
        box-shadow: var(--particle2);
    }

    #extra-div-1::after,
    #extra-div-2::after {
        top: 2560px;
    }
}

/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- BOTTOMER -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

#footer,
#license-area {
    background-color: var(--firstOneiroiColor);
    color: var(--textColor);
}

#footer a {
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

#footer {
    padding-top: 1rem;
}

#license-area {
    padding-top: 0;
}


/*--------------------------------*/
/*----- MOBILE QUERY -----*/
/*--------------------------------*/

@media (max-width: 767px) {

    div#header,
    div#top-bar {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 100%;
    }

    div#side-bar {
        border-radius: 0;
        top: 0;
        left: calc(-2rem - var(--sidebar-width));
        height: 100vh;
        position: fixed;
    }

    #content-wrap::after {
        display: none;
    }

    #login-status {
        padding-top: 0rem;
        padding-left: 0.3rem;
    }

    #login-status span.printuser {
        font-size: 0;
    }

    #login-status span.printuser img {
        font-size: 0;
        transform: translate(6px, 5px);
    }

    #login-status a#my-account {
        display: none;
    }

    #content-wrap {
        margin: 0.5rem 0 0;
    }

    #main-content {
        padding: 0.5em 1.75em 0.75em;
    }

    #side-bar .close-menu {
        opacity: 0;
        margin-left: var(--sidebar-width);
    }

    #side-bar:target .close-menu:hover {
        background: unset;
    }

    #page-title,
    .meta-title {
        font-size: 2em;
    }

    #page-title::before,
    .meta-title::before,
    #page-title::after,
    .meta-title::after {
        min-width: 2.5rem;
        height: 2.5rem;
        margin: 0 0.25rem;
    }
}
[[/code]]

body {
    background-color: var(--secondOneiroiColor);
}

#header {
    --secondOneiroiColor: var(--lightCloudColor);
}

#side-bar {
    --selectionColor: var(--babyBlueColor);
    --secondOneiroiColor: var(--hazyCyanColor);
}

#page-content {
    --firstOneiroiColor: var(--darkNightColor);
    --secondOneiroiColor: var(--lightCloudColor);
}

#extra-div-1,
#extra-div-2 {
    z-index: -1;
}

#footer,
#license-area {
    background-color: var(--secondOneiroiColor);
}
